name: test_e2e_with_logs[178_XSS_DOM_017]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_DOM_017` |
| **Name** | Onmouseover event handler DOM XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | dom_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `onmouseover=alert('DOM')`
